description: This greens & giant couscous salad is packed with veggies and dressed with herby pesto.
name: Pesto Greens & Giant Couscous Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 medium cracked black pepper, diced, deseeded

recipeInstructions.text: Bring 500ml of water to the boil in a large pot and cook the couscous for 10 minutes, until the liquid has been absorbed. Set aside to cool in a large bowl.
Place the broccoli, asparagus, sugarsnaps, spinach and garlic in a large saucepan over a medium high heat, add a tablespoon of pesto and saut√© for 5 minutes, until tender.
Pour the remaining pesto and green vegetable mix over the cooked couscous, add lemon juice and black pepper and mix well to combine before serving.
